results.title: A Phoenix rising
results.brief_description: A documentary film showing how the community of Mt. Macedon is piecing together its life again after being annihilated by the fires of Ash Wednesday. The film is based on interviews with some of the residents and gives case studies of a couple of families. Written and narrated by John Bonney.
results.description: A documentary film showing how the community of Mt. Macedon is piecing together its life again after being annihilated by the fires of Ash Wednesday. results.title: A Perfectly normal day
results.brief_description:
Episode of Series “Time Management”.
Professor Cake in PhD, Harvard show that a typical work day is filled with interruptions and crisis and goes about showing you how to mange. Some very good advice. Turns a crisis into an opportunity.

results.title: A Park community
results.brief_description: The park is a natural ecosystem within the city. Plants are the producers, using energy from the sun to produce food by photosynthesis. Animals are the consumers; mushrooms are decomposers. man contributes by mowing the grass and pruning the trees and shrubs to substitute for grazing and browsing animals that are not there, he also fertilizes to supplement natural decay, and waters to supplement natural rainfall. These inter-relationships are examined and a pattern of observation for exploring a local park is thus provided.

results.title: A Pair of moccasins for Mary Thomas
results.creator_credit: Geoff Voyce, National Indian Arts and Crafts and B T Filmsound
results.brief_description: We follow Mary Thomas, a Sioux Interior Salish Indian, as she makes a pair of moccasins, the most common Indian footwear and a part of Indian cultural heritage. Starting from the treating of animal hide, Mary uses traditional methods, right through to the finished product.
results.title_for_label: A Pair of moccasins for Mary Thomas
results.creator_credit_for_label: Geoff Voyce, National Indian Arts and Crafts and B T Filmsound

results.title: Labor and childbirth
results.creator_credit: D.M. Hatfield and Photo & Sound Productions
results.brief_description:
Episode of Series “Education for Childbirth”.
A young couple expects their first child. Shows onset of labor, the trip to the hospital, call to doctor, admission to maternity ward, routine preparations for delivery, including instructions to mother, and normal birth of child. Stresses the assumption that fear stems from lack of knowledge.

results.title: Prenatal care
results.creator_credit: C Larrance, D.M. Hatfield and Photo & Sound Productions
results.brief_description:
Episode of Series “Education for Childbirth”.
Through the prenatal care of three women in different stages of pregnancy, explains the need for medical examination and care, discusses correct diet, exercises for daily use, proper clothing, and a healthy attitude of mind.

results.title: Postnatal care
results.brief_description:
Episode of Series “Education for Childbirth”.
Shows the mother in her hospital room, doing exercises, caring for her baby, nursing etc. It discusses the father’s relation to the new situation and portrays some of the joy to be found in the new family constellation. Diagrams show how the mother’s body returns to normal.

results.title: A Normal birth
results.brief_description:
Episode of Series “Education for Childbirth”.
A photographic record of an actual delivery depicting the normal processes of childbirth and the two final stages of labour. The preparation of the mother in the delivery room, the actual birth of the child, and the immediate post-birth care of both mother and child are shown.
